invalid_objectid: {property} argument must be a single String of 12 bytes or a string of 24 hex characters
invalid_string: {property} argument must be a single String
invalid_number: {property} argument must be a single Number
invalid_boolean: {property} argument must be a single Boolean
invalid_email: {property} argument must be a valid email
invalid_phone: {property} argument must be a valid phone number
max_length: {property} must be shorter than or equal to {c0} characters
invalid_postal_code: {property} is not a valid postal code
invalid_credit_card: {property} is not a valid credit card number
